title: SMC_ArticulatedRobot_6DOF_J0_State (Enum)
text:
TYPE SMC_ArticulatedRobot_6DOF_J0_State :
The possible configuration states of joint 0 of the 6DOF robot arm.

rows.Name: SMC_AR_ARMFORWARD
rows.Comment: The arm is pointing towards the wrist center

rows.Name: SMC_AR_ARMBACKWARDS
rows.Comment: The arm is pointing opposite to the wrist center

rows.Name: SMC_AR_ARMSTRAIGHT
rows.Comment: The wrist center is directly above joint 0 (singular case)
